textContent: The normal, full priced, tickets to Euruko 2020 will go on sale on the 29th of January at 13:00 UTC. The tickets cost â‚¬120 and orders are limited to two tickets per order.

We are planning to open the call for proposals in March, though we don't have a precise date for it. If you buy a ticket and your talk gets accepted we will of course refund you for it (or you can transfer it to someone else yourself).
